original_text: Menahem exacted the money from Israel, that is, from all the wealthy men, fifty shekels of silver from every man, to give to the king of Assyria. So the king of Assyria turned back and did not stay there in the land.
korean_text: 그 은을 이스라엘 모든 큰 부자에게서 강탈하여 각 사람에게 은 오십 세겔씩 내게 하여 앗수르 왕에게 주었더니 이에 앗수르 왕이 되돌아가 그 땅에 머물지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: Menahem exacted the money from Israel
that is, from all the wealthy men
fifty shekels of silver from every man
sentences.korean_translation: 사람 한 명당 은 오십 세겔을,

sentences.original_text: to give to the king of Assyria
So the king of Assyria turned back
and did not stay there in the land
